content: The Utopia P2P Is looking for permanent moderators, but first, they want to try you out for one month. The exact pay will be discussed individually with each person, but they assure it'll be a fair amount for where you live. If you're active and meet your goals, there are extra bonuses for you.You'll need to work at least 7 days a week, 8 hours a day.  Right now, they only need one moderator per country.They're looking for moderators for the following geographic regions (GEO):Code:Israel:Egypt:Indonesia:Vietnam:India:Philippines: (Reserved)Turkiye:Azerbaijan:Ukraine:Georgia:Armenia:Uzbekistan:Brazil:Serbia:Montenegro:China:Please send your application, along with your portfolio to: Telegram:https://t.me/lorrels (@lorrels)Email martin_v@cryptohill.io
